Leaderboard.EarnYourSpot: Earn Your Spot on the Leaderboard
Leaderboard.EarnYourSpotDescription: No community members have reached the leaderboard yet. Be the first to get on the leaderboard by posting an idea on an open challenge.
Leaderboard.LeaderboardSummaryDescription: No community members have reached the leaderboard yet.

Labels.OptimalImageSize: Optimal image size for email is 800px x 250px.

Labels.Header: You Haven't Posted any Challenges Yet
Labels.Description: Use challenges to collect targeted feedback from your community.
Labels.CollectDescription: Collect ideas from your team or entire organization. Collaborate around submissions in real time.
Labels.CollaborateDescription: Use participants knowledge to automatically surface the best submissions.
Labels.SelectDescription: Decision makers further evaluate top ideas based on custom criteria and select winners.

Labels.TermOne: Are you sure you would like to archive this challenge? Doing so will have the following effects.
Labels.TermTwo: All ideas submitted to this challenge will inherit the current settings set by it.

ChallengeView.HaveBeenPosted: Have Been Posted in This Challenge
ChallengeView.NotVisibleTitle: Are Currently Not Visible in this Challenge
ChallengeView.NotVisibleDescriptionOne: This challenge's settings currently prevent users from seeing each others
ChallengeView.NotVisibleDescriptionTwo: may become visible at a later date or after winners for the challenge are announced.

Labels.SelectParticipantsDisc: Participants are the users we want to collect submissions from. You can limit participation by searching and limiting access to specific groups above.
Labels.SponsorsDescription: Administrators are sponsors of a challenge who have authority to action the ideas being collected.
Labels.ModeratorsDescription: Moderators help facilitate your challenge and have the ability to edit ideas, comments, and settings of the challenge.
Labels.InfoControlAccessDescriptionOne: Only the 'participants' who are targeted for your challenge will be able to see this challenge from the 'challenges list' page.
Labels.InfoControlAccessDescriptionTwo: By default, all community members will have access to participate in your challenge. You can limit participation by searching and limiting access to specific users and groups under the 'Participants' section.
Labels.InfoParticipantsDescription: Each role has different permissions for posting submissions, editing challenge details, and editing challenge settings. For more information on these roles, please see our Knowledgebase.
Labels.OptimalImageSize: Optimal image size for email is 800px x 250px.
Labels.Title: Challenge Title
Labels.PlaceholderTitle: How might we improve customer experience this year?
Labels.PlaceholderDescription: At Example Company, our goal is to always deliver a superior customer experience. Let us know how we can transform the way we help add value to our consumers.
Labels.PublicAccess: All users who have access to the community can view submissions to this challenge.
Labels.SpecificGroupsAccess: Only the groups you designate will be able to view submissions made to this challenge.
Labels.PrivateAccess: Only Challenge Sponsor, Challenge Moderators, Owners, Team Members, and the idea submitter will be able to see this idea.
Labels.SelectDuplicatesScopeDescription: Should duplicates be shown for all ideas each participant has access to, or just duplicate ideas within this challenge?
Labels.AllIdeasAccess: All Submissions User Has Access To
Labels.AllIdeasAccessDescription: Duplicate ideas across all submissions a user has access to will display.
Labels.OnlyChallengeIdeasDescription: Only duplicate ideas within this challenge will be displayed.
Labels.AllowAnonymousIdea: Allow Ideas to be Submitted Anonymously
Labels.AllowAnonymousComment: Allow Comments to be Submitted Anonymously
Labels.DefaultAnonymousSubmissions: Make All Submissions Anonymous by Default
Labels.DefaultAnonymousComments: Make All Comments Anonymous by Default
Labels.DefaultAnonymousVotes: Make All Votes Anonymous by Default

Labels.FiltersMobileMessage: Filters will activate on the page as you select them. To hide filtering options, simply click anywhere outside of this dropdown.

Labels.Title: Prize Title

Workflows.Name: Workflow Name
Workflows.ArchiveMessage: Are you sure you would like to archive this workflow? Please review the effects of archiving groups before proceeding.

Profile.NoBookmarksHeader: You Don't Have Any Bookmarks Yet
Profile.NoBookmarksDescription: Bookmark ideas and users to more easily find them later.
Profile.NotFollowingDescription: Follow ideas and users to receive updates on their activity and progress.
Profile.DeactivatedUserDescription: This user has been removed from Ideawake and can no longer access the community.
Profile.SkillsDescription: Skills help us match you with ideas, users, and challenges.
Profile.UserNameDescription: Your username is how users can mention you in ideas, comments, and other content. Usernames must not have any spaces and cannot be taken by another member of your community.
Profile.NoActivity: You Don't Have Any Activity Yet
Profile.WelcomeMessage: Welcome to the community! Get started by sharing your ideas on challenges to make your organization a better place.

Activity.AsAMember: as a team member on this

Comments.DisabledAlert: Posting new comments is currently disabled.
Comments.Placeholder: Use the @ symbol to mention other team members and groups or use the #hashtag symbol to make your comment searchable
Comments.PlaceholderLarge: Start typing your comment... Use the @ symbol to mention other team members and groups or use the #hashtag symbol to make your comment searchable
Comments.ArchiveDescription: Are you sure you would like to archive this comment? If archived, this comment will no longer be visible in the comments stream. To confirm, click on the Archive button below.
Comments.NoComments: No comments have been posted on this idea yet.

SharedText.NoTagsDescription: There are no tags to filter by yet...
SharedText.RefineInstructionsDescriptionTwo: to help plan how it will work and assess its potential.
SharedText.RefineInstructionsPointOne: Complete each of the questions below to the best of your ability.
SharedText.RefineInstructionsPointTwo: See who's assigned to complete this step above and track your progress to completion.
SharedText.RefineInstructionsPointThree: Collaborate with others assigned using the comments section to the right. Use the @ symbol to notify specific members.
SharedText.ScorecardInstructionsHeader: How to Complete a Scorecard on an Idea
SharedText.ScorecardInstructionsDescription: Please complete each question on the right side of your screen by selecting the option that you believe best represents the question being asked. For more information, please see our knowledgebase.
SharedText.andCompleteScorecard: and Complete the Scorecard to the Right
SharedText.AccessDeniedHeader: You Don't Have Permission to View This Page
SharedText.AccessDeniedDescription: Please go back and reach out to your community administrator or moderator to give you access to this opportunityType.
SharedText.NoFoundHeader: Oops, We Can't Seem to Find That Page
SharedText.NoFoundDescription: Our innovation detectives are looking into why this happened, please go back to the home page to keep innovating.
SharedText.Title: Title

Post.SimilarTooltip: Is your idea similar to any of these? Instead of posting it again, help add onto the current ideas already posted!
Post.Title: Title
Post.DescriptionPlaceholderTwo: You can mention others using the @ symbol and tag your
Post.DescriptionPlaceholderThree: using the # symbol to make it searchable...
Post.CancelDescription: By discarding this idea you will lose any progress on it. Are you sure you would like to proceed?

Settings.Name: Name
Settings.ResendGroupInvites: Resend invites to members of this group who have not signed up
Settings.BasicSettingsDescription: Manage basic community settings and login settings, including Single Sign On.
Settings.AppearanceSettingsDescription: Customize logo, color scheme, and look and feel of your community.
Settings.CustomizePointsDescription: Customize the points users earn for performing actions in your community.
Settings.TypesOfPostsDescription: Create different types of submissions with their own fields and settings.
Settings.CustomFieldsDescription: Create the fields important to you and the opportunities you're collecting.
Settings.ManageCommunitiesDescription: Create communities with their own branding, messaging, and permissions.
Settings.SelectGroups: Select Groups to Add These Users To
Settings.SelectRoleTooltip: A users role determines their level of permissions in Ideawake. The 'User' role has the lowest level permissions and the 'Administrator' role has the highest level permissions.
Settings.CopyPasteCSV: Or, Copy and Paste from CSV (Bulk Invite)
Settings.CopyPasteCSVTooltip: Need to invite dozens or hundreds at a time? Use this option to copy and paste your list from a CSV
Settings.BulkInviteDescription: Copy and paste a list of contacts from your email. Please only include one contact per line.
Settings.ImportHeader: Import Data from CSV or TSV

ChallengeStatus.EvaluationStatusMessage: Thanks for participating in this challenge! New submissions are no longer open, but top submissions are currently being reviewed. We will keep you posted and provide an update once winners are announced!
ChallengeStatus.ClosedStatusMessage: This challenge is now closed, thanks for participating and keep sharing your ideas by checking out the challenges that are currently open.
